title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A guide to building better habits and breaking bad ones with actionable strategies rooted in behavioral psychology.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
description: Explores the two systems of thinking that drive our decisions and judgments: the fast, intuitive system and the slow, deliberate system.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
description: Focuses on mindfulness and living in the present moment to achieve personal peace and clarity.

title: Man’s Search for Meaning
author: Viktor E. Frankl
description: A Holocaust survivor’s reflections on finding meaning in life through suffering and purpose.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: A guide to cultivating focus in a distracted world and producing high-quality work efficiently.
